title: Regarding Hackathon Marks
content: Can anyone tell me how is the Hackathon marks gonna be added to our final marks.

comments.body:
Depends subject to subject.
Also it jeeps changing yearly so dunno :)
Can you tell me for 5th sem core subjects

MI was the only one we had hackathon for in 5th sem.
We had something like 5 marks for MI( donâ€™t remember exact)

I am a TA for DSA so I'll tell you about DSA. 

The hackathon will have a total of 10 marks which will be added in the lab component. So out of 20 marks for the lab component 10 marks is for hackathon and 10 marks is for weekly lab submissions.
Any first sem students taking part in hackathon??
